bug.author: griffonn
bug.description:
When trying to get sentence vector using <denchmark-code>for sent in doc.sents: if sent.has_vector: ... </denchmark-code>
I get the following exception: <denchmark-code> File "span.pyx", line 286, in spacy.tokens.span.Span.has_vector.__get__ AttributeError: 'spacy.tokens.span.Span' object has no attribute 'vocab' </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h2>Your Environment</denchmark-h>
Operating System: Ubuntu Linux 16.04 64-bit Python Version Used: 3.5.2 spaCy Version Used: 2.0.2 Environment Information:
